name: Medal of Honor: Infiltrator
description: Medal of Honor: Infiltrator is a top-down third-person shooter video game, the sixth installment in the Medal of Honor series, and the second game for the Game Boy Advance. The game was developed by Netherock Ltd. and published by EA Games in North America on November 2003, and in Europe and Japan on December 2003. It is the only game in the franchise that PEGI has given a rating of less than 12+.
